messages.subject: FW: Myrtle's house
messages.msgSnippet: I decided to go to the proverbial horse s mouth for the answer to my question regarding Moaning Myrtle s Hogwarts house; a quick google uncovered the ghost s
messages.messageBody:
I decided to go to the proverbial horse's mouth for the answer to my
question regarding Moaning Myrtle's Hogwarts house; a quick google uncovered
the ghost's amusing website and email address, and she was kind enough to
reply:

----------
> From: "Moaning Myrtle" <harrys_army@...>
> Date: Thu, 21 Nov 2002 09:51:13 +0000
> To: Felicitas@...
> Subject: Re: Myrtle's house
>
> Dear American Fan,
>
> The details of my time at Hogwarts are far too terrible for me to recall so
> I have repressed these memories into the deepest recesses of my mind,
> therefore I am unable to inform you of the house I was in throughout my time
> at Hogwarts.
>
> Thank you for your understanding,
>
> Myrtle: Webmistress at Large
>
>
>
> Your toilet has just been invaded by the likes of Moaning Myrtle. Ha ha ha.
> Moan!
>
>
>
>
>
>> From: Nancy Wooton <Felicitas@...>
>> To: <harrys_army@...>
>> Subject: Myrtle's house
>> Date: Wed, 20 Nov 2002 09:31:29 -0800
>>
>> Dear Myrtle,
>>
>> Forgive the intrusion, but a question about you is haunting me --
>>
>> To which of Hogwart's houses do you belong?
>>
>> an American fan
>
>
> _________________________________________________________________
